(Reuters) - Alphabet Incs Google said on Sunday it has removed a number of browser extensions of online conglomerate IAC/InterActive Corp for policy violations and is reviewing enforcement options.

articles.author: Alexis Benveniste, CNN Business
articles.title: Four new things you can do with Google Maps - CNN
articles.description: Google Maps is rolling out new features to make the app more focused on community engagement. It's part of Google Maps' evolution from a directions app to a search-and-answer engine for businesses and customers.

articles.author: Lexy Savvides
articles.title: Is the iPhone 12 waterproof? We took it for a swim to test its water resistance - CNET
articles.description: Apple's iPhone 12 put up a good fight after being submerged in the chilly waters of Lake Tahoe.
articles.content: We know the iPhone 12 can handle spills and splashes, but Apple may be downplaying just how water-resistant this phone really is. The iPhone 12's IP68 rating means it can survive up to 19.6 feet (6 m… [+5264 chars]
